Multiples each value in a given tuple by a coefficient.

misc.multiply_point(point: tuple[float, Ellipsis], coef: float) → tuple[float, Ellipsis]#

Multiples each value in a given tuple by a coefficient.

Parameters

  • point (tuple[float, ...]) – the point to multiply.

  • coef (float) – the coefficient to multiply the points by.

Returns

the tuple, where each element is multiplied by the coefficient.

Return type

tuple[float]

misc.add_points(points: list[tuple[float, Ellipsis]], coefs=None) → tuple[float, Ellipsis]#

Adds values in tuples (for adding coordinates).

Parameters

  • points (list[tuple[float, ...]]) – list of tuples to add together.

  • coefs (list[float]) – coefficients before the tuples (all 1’s by default).

Raises

AssertionError: if the number of tuples and coefficients are not equal.

Raises

AssertionError: if the number of values is not equal in all tuples.

Returns

the sum of tuples.

Return type

tuple[float, …]

misc.point_ceil(p: tuple[float, Ellipsis]) → tuple[int, Ellipsis]#

Computes the ceiling of a tuple.

Parameters

p (tuple[float, ...]) – a tuple.

Returns

tuple of ceilings of all values in the given tuple.

Return type

tuple[int, …]

misc.euclidian_dist(p1: tuple[float, float], p2=(0, 0)) → float#

Calculates the Euclidian distance between two points.

Parameters

  • p1 (tuple[float, float]) – coordinates of point 1.

  • p2 (tuple[float, float]) – coordinates of point 2.

Returns

the Euclidean distance between two 2D points.

Return type

float
